abstract: Procter & Gamble, the nation’s largest advertiser, is resuming a campaign honoring mothers, which the company described as among its most popular and successful.
snippet: Procter & Gamble, the nation’s largest advertiser, is resuming a campaign honoring mothers, which the company described as among its most popular and successful.
lead_paragraph: Procter & Gamble, the nation’s largest advertiser, is resuming a campaign honoring mothers, which the company described as among its most popular and successful.

headline.main: Procter & Gamble Says ‘Hello, Mother’ As It Resumes a Campaign
